The 'iDeal Roadmap'

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color="#1b1c27" show_divider="on" _builder_version="3.0.106" max_width="50%" module_alignment="center"][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row make_fullwidth="on" custom_width_px="1650px" use_custom_gutter="on" gutter_width="2" custom_padding="48px|0px|27px|0" make_equal="on" module_class="et_animated" _builder_version="3.0.106" animation_style="fade" animation_duration="700ms" animation_starting_opacity="100%"][et_pb_column type="1_4" _builder_version="3.0.47" parallax="off" parallax_method="on"][et_pb_blurb title="Q4 2017" _builder_version="3.0.106" header_level="h3" header_font="Lato|900|||||||" background_color="#e5e8f1" custom_padding="20px|20px|20px|20px"]

  • iDealCash is created

  • Started building new community on Telegram and Discord channels
[/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_counters background_color="#e5e8f1" _builder_version="3.0.106" border_radii="on|10px|10px|10px|10px"][et_pb_counter percent="100" bar_background_color="#3c3c3b" _builder_version="3.0.106" background_color_default="#e5e8f1" bar_background_color_default="#7EBEC5" use_percentages="on"][/et_pb_counter][/et_pb_counters][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="1_4" _builder_version="3.0.47" parallax="off" parallax_method="on"][et_pb_blurb title="Q1 2018" _builder_version="3.0.106" header_level="h3" header_font="Lato|900|||||||" background_color="#D1D2D4" custom_padding="20px|20px|20px|20px"]

  • Rebrand to Atheneum ( AEM ) brand with new website and social media channels

  • Community structure with voting as driver of coin and policy

[/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_counters background_color="#e5e8f1" _builder_version="3.0.106" border_radii="on|10px|10px|10px|10px"][et_pb_counter percent="90" bar_background_color="#3c3c3b" _builder_version="3.0.106" background_color_default="#e5e8f1" bar_background_color_default="#7EBEC5" use_percentages="on"][/et_pb_counter][/et_pb_counters][et_pb_blurb title="Q2 2018" _builder_version="3.0.106" header_level="h3" header_font="Lato|900|||||||" background_color="#D1D2D4" custom_padding="20px|20px|20px|20px"]

  • Deliver ﬁrst Atheneum wallet

  • Reﬁne use-case as education marketplace and develop whitepaper to provide platform goals and plans for execution

[/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_counters background_color="#e5e8f1" _builder_version="3.0.106" border_radii="on|10px|10px|10px|10px"][et_pb_counter percent="60" bar_background_color="#3c3c3b" _builder_version="3.0.106" background_color_default="#e5e8f1" bar_background_color_default="#7EBEC5" use_percentages="on"][/et_pb_counter][/et_pb_counters][et_pb_blurb title="Q3 2018" _builder_version="3.0.106" header_level="h3" header_font="Lato|900|||||||" background_color="#D1D2D4" custom_padding="20px|20px|20px|20px"]

  • Deliver whitepaper forpublic dissemination

  • Begin platform development of website and backend

  • Deﬁne Marketing Strategy and plan of action

  • Create budget
[/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_counters background_color="#e5e8f1" _builder_version="3.0.106" border_radii="on|10px|10px|10px|10px"][et_pb_counter percent="15" bar_background_color="#3c3c3b" _builder_version="3.0.106" background_color_default="#e5e8f1" bar_background_color_default="#7EBEC5" use_percentages="on"][/et_pb_counter][/et_pb_counters][et_pb_blurb title="Q4 2018" _builder_version="3.0.106" header_level="h3" header_font="Lato|900|||||||" background_color="#D1D2D4" custom_padding="20px|20px|20px|20px"]
  • Begin business development -Partnerships and public awareness
  • Develop campaigns for marketing including social media, banner and others
[/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_counters background_color="#e5e8f1" _builder_version="3.0.106" border_radii="on|10px|10px|10px|10px"][et_pb_counter bar_background_color="#3c3c3b" _builder_version="3.0.106" background_color_default="#e5e8f1" bar_background_color_default="#7EBEC5" use_percentages="on"][/et_pb_counter][/et_pb_counters][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="1_4" _builder_version="3.0.47" parallax="off" parallax_method="on"][et_pb_blurb title="Q1 2019" _builder_version="3.0.106" header_level="h3" header_font="Lato|900|||||||" background_color="rgba(236,148,33,0.8)" custom_padding="20px|20px|20px|20px"]

  • Beta platform testing begins allowing select users and educators to begin using Atheneum

  • Survey and focus group tests begin

  • Launch AEM marketing campaigns
[/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_counters background_color="#e5e8f1" _builder_version="3.0.106" border_radii="on|10px|10px|10px|10px"][et_pb_counter bar_background_color="#3c3c3b" _builder_version="3.0.106" background_color_default="#e5e8f1" bar_background_color_default="#7EBEC5" use_percentages="on"][/et_pb_counter][/et_pb_counters][et_pb_blurb title="Q2 2019" _builder_version="3.0.106" header_level="h3" header_font="Lato|900|||||||" background_color="rgba(236,148,33,0.8)" custom_padding="20px|20px|20px|20px"]

  • Review beta testing and focus survey results to determine adjustments required in addition to platform viability

  • Generate additional traction through enhanced public outreach

[/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_counters background_color="#e5e8f1" _builder_version="3.0.106" border_radii="on|10px|10px|10px|10px"][et_pb_counter bar_background_color="#3c3c3b" _builder_version="3.0.106" background_color_default="#e5e8f1" bar_background_color_default="#7EBEC5" use_percentages="on"][/et_pb_counter][/et_pb_counters][et_pb_blurb title="Q3 2019" _builder_version="3.0.106" header_level="h3" header_font="Lato|900|||||||" background_color="rgba(236,148,33,0.8)" custom_padding="20px|20px|20px|20px"]

  • Reﬁne target audience and marketing to allow for platform changes in response to bug ﬁxes and adjustments to platform based on beta

[/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_counters background_color="#e5e8f1" _builder_version="3.0.106" border_radii="on|10px|10px|10px|10px"][et_pb_counter bar_background_color="#3c3c3b" _builder_version="3.0.106" background_color_default="#e5e8f1" bar_background_color_default="#7EBEC5" use_percentages="on"][/et_pb_counter][/et_pb_counters][et_pb_blurb title="Q4 2019" _builder_version="3.0.106" header_level="h3" header_font="Lato|900|||||||" background_color="rgba(236,148,33,0.8)" custom_padding="20px|20px|20px|20px"]

  • Launch the Atheneum production platform

  • Assess performance and acceptance of platform

  • Identify market & ancillary opportunities

[/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_counters background_color="#e5e8f1" _builder_version="3.0.106" border_radii="on|10px|10px|10px|10px"][et_pb_counter bar_background_color="#3c3c3b" _builder_version="3.0.106" background_color_default="#e5e8f1" bar_background_color_default="#7EBEC5" use_percentages="on"][/et_pb_counter][/et_pb_counters][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="1_4" _builder_version="3.0.47" parallax="off" parallax_method="on"][et_pb_blurb title="Q1 2020" _builder_version="3.0.106" header_level="h3" header_font="Lato|900|||||||" header_text_color="#e5e8f1" body_text_color="#e5e8f1" background_color="#3c3c3b" custom_padding="20px|20px|20px|20px"]

  • Adjustments to production and incorporation of feature requests

  • Enhancement of revenue and opportunities

[/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_counters background_color="#e5e8f1" _builder_version="3.0.106" border_radii="on|10px|10px|10px|10px"][et_pb_counter bar_background_color="#3c3c3b" _builder_version="3.0.106" background_color_default="#e5e8f1" bar_background_color_default="#7EBEC5" use_percentages="on"][/et_pb_counter][/et_pb_counters][et_pb_blurb title="Q2 2020" _builder_version="3.0.106" header_level="h3" header_font="Lato|900|||||||" header_text_color="#e5e8f1" body_text_color="#e5e8f1" background_color="#3c3c3b" custom_padding="20px|20px|20px|20px"]

  • Assessment of product longer term viability

  • Ongoing effort to improve and adjust to market requirements
[/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_counters background_color="#e5e8f1" _builder_version="3.0.106" border_radii="on|10px|10px|10px|10px"][et_pb_counter bar_background_color="#3c3c3b" _builder_version="3.0.106" background_color_default="#e5e8f1" bar_background_color_default="#7EBEC5" use_percentages="on"][/et_pb_counter][/et_pb_counters][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built="1" background_color="#ede7f6" admin_label="Hero Section" _builder_version="3.0.93" use_background_color_gradient="on" background_color_gradient_start="#2e3857" background_color_gradient_end="#212529" background_image="https://idealcash.io/wp-content/uploads/2018/04/img02.jpg" background_position="bottom_center" custom_padding="117px|0px|100px|0px" custom_padding_tablet="0px||0px|"][et_pb_row custom_padding="|||" background_blend_2="overlay" _builder_version="3.0.93" background_size="initial" background_position="top_left" background_repeat="repeat"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="3.0.47" parallax="off" parallax_method="on"][et_pb_text background_layout="dark" _builder_version="3.0.93" text_font="PT Sans||||||||" text_font_size="18px" text_text_color="rgba(255,255,255,0.7)" text_line_height="1.8em" header_font="Poppins|500|||||||" header_font_size="44px" header_line_height="1.3em" header_2_font="||||||||" header_3_font="||||||||" header_4_font="||||||||"]

Lightning Fast

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version="3.0.106"]

Transaction made on the iDealCash network are almost instantaneous requiring only 8 seconds or less to be visible in your wallet

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="1_4" _builder_version="3.0.47" parallax="off" parallax_method="on"][et_pb_image src="https://idealcash.io/wp-content/uploads/2018/04/noun_1346201_cc.png" _builder_version="3.0.106"][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version="3.0.106" header_font="||||||||" header_3_font="||||||||" custom_margin="0px|||" custom_padding="0px|||"]

30% Annual Stake

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version="3.0.106"]

iDealCash holders will receive 30% floating reward per coin per year. So your investment just keeps on growing

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="1_4" _builder_version="3.0.47" parallax="off" parallax_method="on"][et_pb_image src="https://idealcash.io/wp-content/uploads/2018/04/noun_1662341_cc.png" _builder_version="3.0.106"][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version="3.0.106" header_font="||||||||" header_3_font="||||||||" custom_margin="0px|||" custom_padding="0px|||"]

Secure

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version="3.0.106"]

iDealCash is security focused and is continually looking at ways to ensure the security of our blockchain and our community.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="1_4" _builder_version="3.0.47" parallax="off" parallax_method="on"][et_pb_image src="https://idealcash.io/wp-content/uploads/2018/04/noun_935847_cc.png" _builder_version="3.0.106"][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version="3.0.106" header_font="||||||||" header_3_font="||||||||" custom_margin="0px|||" custom_padding="0px|||"]

Low Fees

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version="3.0.106"]

Transaction fees on the iDealCash network amount to just 0.0001 DEAL to transfer 10,000,000 DEAL.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built="1" admin_label="community" module_id="aboutus" _builder_version="3.0.106" use_background_color_gradient="on" background_color_gradient_start="#e09900" background_color_gradient_end="#ffffff" custom_padding="80px|0px||0px" top_divider_height="50px" top_divider_flip="horizontal" bottom_divider_height="49px" bottom_divider_flip="horizontal"][et_pb_row custom_padding="24px|0px|24px|0px" _builder_version="3.0.106" background_size="initial" background_position="top_left" background_repeat="repeat"][et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="3.0.47" parallax="off" parallax_method="on"][et_pb_text _builder_version="3.0.106" text_font="||||||||" text_text_color="rgba(255,255,255,0.7)" text_font_size="18px" header_font="||||||||" header_text_align="center" header_text_color="#ffffff" header_font_size="38px" header_2_font="Poppins|500|||||||" header_2_font_size="38px" header_2_line_height="1.3em" header_3_font="||||||||" header_4_font="||||||||" text_orientation="center" background_layout="dark" max_width="700px" module_alignment="center" custom_padding="|||" inline_fonts="Rubik"]

Community and Vision

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color="#1b1c27" _builder_version="3.2" max_width="50%" module_alignment="center"][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version="3.0.106" module_alignment="center"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="3.0.47" parallax="off" parallax_method="on"][et_pb_blurb title="Community" _builder_version="3.0.106" header_level="h3" header_font="Lato|900|||||||" body_font_size="18px" body_line_height="1.8em"] What makes iDealCash special is our ever-growing community. Every day, more and more people see what we see in iDealCash and want to play a part in its evolution. They believe in the vision, in our vision, in the vision of all those involved in cryptocurrencies, but with one key difference, they believe iDealCash will be the project that will help realize this vision. [/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="3.0.47" parallax="off" parallax_method="on"][et_pb_image src="https://idealcash.io/wp-content/uploads/2018/04/icon-leadership-300x300.png" align="center" disabled_on="on|on|off" _builder_version="3.0.106" max_width="52%" module_alignment="center" animation_style="slide"][/et_pb_image][et_pb_image _builder_version="3.0.106"][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row custom_padding="||64px|" _builder_version="3.0.106" module_alignment="center"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="3.0.47" parallax="off" parallax_method="on"][et_pb_image src="https://idealcash.io/wp-content/uploads/2018/03/0968357a-2106-4565-8f97-6786e03ced12-1.png" align="center" disabled_on="on|on|off" _builder_version="3.0.106" max_width="62%" module_alignment="center" custom_padding="4px||10px|" animation_style="fold"][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="3.0.47" parallax="off" parallax_method="on"][et_pb_blurb title="Vision" _builder_version="3.0.106" header_level="h3" header_font="Lato|900|||||||" body_font="||||||||" body_font_size="18px" body_line_height="1.8em"] We want DEAL to become the primary coin that the world uses to transact value and material goods. We are aiming for mass adoption and to achieve this we must create products that embed iDealCash into our daily lives. We are working on technologies that will enable us to enter this space. We want our vision to be your vision and we want to ensure that you, the community, are part of the future that iDealCash is destined to bring to this world An individual experienced in the crypto space who has been trading these assets and others for over 10 years. He is the founder of iDealCash and he has great expectations for iDealCash in the future. Tyler is working extensively to get iDealCash listed on more exchanges as well as adding more skillful individuals to the iDealCash Team. [/et_pb_text][et_pb_image src="https://idealcash.io/wp-content/uploads/2018/04/myAvatar-3.png" _builder_version="3.0.106" custom_margin="|||" custom_padding="30px|||" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" animation="off" sticky="off"][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version="3.0.106" text_font="Roboto||||" text_text_color="#000000" text_font_size="24" text_line_height="1.5em" background_size="initial" background_position="top_left" background_repeat="repeat" text_orientation="center" module_alignment="center" custom_margin="20px||0px|" custom_css_main_element="font-weight:400;" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid"] Fedir [/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version="3.0.106" text_font="Roboto|100|||||||" text_text_color="#ea7500" text_font_size="18" text_line_height="1.5em" background_size="initial" background_position="top_left" background_repeat="repeat" text_orientation="center" module_alignment="center" custom_margin="0px|||" custom_css_main_element="font-weight:300;" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid"] Developer [/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version="3.0.106" text_font="Roboto|100|||||||" text_text_color="#000000" text_font_size="18" text_line_height="1.5em" background_size="initial" background_position="top_left" background_repeat="repeat" text_orientation="center" module_alignment="center" custom_margin="-4px|||" custom_css_main_element="font-weight:300;" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid"]Fedir has over 20 years experience, mastering multiple programming languages capable of implementing disaster recovery modules, C++, HTML, JavaScript, and other programming languages. Fedir has exceptional problem-solving skills and has expert proficiency with Linux and UNIX operating systems. [/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="1_3" _builder_version="3.0.47" column_padding_mobile="on" parallax="off" parallax_method="off"][et_pb_image src="https://idealcash.io/wp-content/uploads/2018/04/myAvatar-2.png" _builder_version="3.0.106" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" animation="off" sticky="off"][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version="3.0.106" text_font="Roboto||||" text_text_color="#000000" text_font_size="24" text_line_height="1.5em" background_size="initial" background_position="top_left" background_repeat="repeat" text_orientation="center" module_alignment="center" custom_margin="20px||0px|" custom_css_main_element="font-weight:400;" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid"] Firat [/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version="3.0.106" text_font="Roboto|100|||||||" text_text_color="#ea7500" text_font_size="18" text_line_height="1.5em" background_size="initial" background_position="top_left" background_repeat="repeat" text_orientation="center" module_alignment="center" custom_margin="0px|||" custom_css_main_element="font-weight:300;" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid"]Chief of Operations [/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version="3.0.106" text_font="Roboto|100|||||||" text_text_color="#000000" text_font_size="18" text_line_height="1.5em" background_size="initial" background_position="top_left" background_repeat="repeat" text_orientation="center" module_alignment="center" custom_margin="0px|||" custom_css_main_element="font-weight:300;" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid"] Firat has many years of project and product management experience in the technology sector. He is a marketing guru and has vast experience in computing and some experience in coding in languages such as Java, Python, and Javascript. He is a doer, and he has been a key driving force for iDealCash. He will continue on with marketing efforts and continue to support and provide the community with updates in the future. Please note: After first installing the app, please open your Android settings, click on Apps, then iDealCash, Permissions and enable Storage. This will allow you to install to a custom data directory on your MicroSD card and make wallet.dat backups. Keep in mind this is beta software and will continue to improve. Always backup your wallet to another device like USB drives.

We initially wanted to have this wallet staking in the background, but during testing, we found that too many resources were consumed and as such you will only receive stakes on your phone if you have the application visibly open on the phone. Our developers have now identified a potential new way of staking in the background that does not take up as many resources and we are working hard to bring this to you in the very near future!

item.title: Cookie Policy
item.dc:creator: FHE92
item.content:encoded: This site uses cookies - small text files that are placed on your machine to help the site provide a better user experience. In general, cookies are used to retain user preferences, store information for things like shopping baskets, and provide anonymised tracking data to third party applications like Google Analytics. As a rule, cookies will make your browsing experience better. However, you may prefer to disable cookies on this site and on others. The most effective way to do this is to disable cookies in your browser. We suggest consulting the Help section of your browser or taking a look at the About Cookies website which offers guidance for all modern browsers

[et_pb_section fb_built="1" _builder_version="3.0.47"][et_pb_row _builder_version="3.0.47" background_size="initial" background_position="top_left" background_repeat="repeat"][et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="3.0.47" parallax="off" parallax_method="on"][et_pb_text _builder_version="3.2.2"]

Privacy Policy

We (idealcash.io) do not store any user data on our server. We do not use tracking cookies or store any kind of private data, you can browse this site with cookies turned off. However we do rely on service providers and content delivery networks that may store such information outside of our control, and you may have to rely on service providers (including, but not limited to, Internet Service Providers) that may store private data or logs, which are also outside of our control. Regardless, we cannot be held responsible for any tracking of any kind while you are on this site. [/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
